name: Blox 3D Junior
description:
Blox 3D Junior lets kids build and print 3D models in a simple and intuitive manner.
Create beautiful objects using tap to create and double tap to delete.
Export your creations to a printable file via email and 3D print them for amazing real world results!
**Featured in Purdue University's Engineering Guide for Kids and Featured by Apple in Creativity Top Ten**

*Since 2014, kids have built over 2.5 million models and it has been used by hundreds of teachers worldwide.
*Add stickers for eyes or cool patterns in a simple,intuitive manner and send off your creations to be printed.
*Lesson plans and demo videos bundled in the app give teachers and kids hours of exercises to do, from 3d Modelling to 3D Printing and Painting/Finishing for real world toys.
*Sharing option allows kids to create cool animated movies of their creations and share them via email or iMessage.
